column6:
6 people MAX (no exceptions)
Location:
NRG Stadium is 29 mins away (Minimum traffic off 59 n) Close to IAH Airport. (8 miles away)
Apt location is on N. Sam Houston Parkway E. to 3 mi to 59 s continue 15 mi to Tx288 south 610 to NRG

Plenty of restaurants/Stores. Some that are within 2-5 minutes of my Apartment: 
Los Cucos
Denny's 
Chili's
China Star
Egg & I
Mi Rancho
Wingstop
Italiano's
Pizza Hut
Starbucks
Longhorn Steak house
Walmart
CVS
Walgreens
Marshalls & more....
